name: ldr-puppeteer-tests
description: Puppeteer UI tests for Local Deep Research

scripts.test:all: npm run test:deep && npm run test:ui && npm run test:ssrf
scripts.test:ci: rm -rf screenshots/* 2>/dev/null; HEADLESS=true mocha test_deep_functionality.js test_ui_functionality.js test_ssrf_protection.js --timeout 600000 --reporter spec
scripts.test:ssrf:watch: rm -rf screenshots/* 2>/dev/null; HEADLESS=false SLOW_MO=50 mocha test_ssrf_protection.js --timeout 300000
scripts.test:ui:watch: rm -rf screenshots/* 2>/dev/null; HEADLESS=false SLOW_MO=50 mocha test_ui_functionality.js --timeout 300000
scripts.test:deep:watch: rm -rf screenshots/* 2>/dev/null; HEADLESS=false SLOW_MO=50 mocha test_deep_functionality.js --timeout 300000
